content: crochet appliques are always fun to make they are often very easy and quick to whip up crocheted appliques are versatile you could literally make an applique of anything you love they make great embellishments for many crochet projects you can use them to adore your crochet blankets hats clothing bag and many other craft projects you can also make crochet wall hangings and buntings from crocheted appliques today am sharing the pattern for this cute and adorable crochet cat applique there are many cat patterns made in the rounds this pattern is started of with chain stitches with basic and simple stitches you can easily whip up this adorable kitty silhouette materials used - 8 ply yarn 4 mm crochet hook size - 3 inches checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/fk90rquds8q
